pullRequest.title: [BEAM-9679] Add Partition task to Core Transform katas
pullRequest.bodyText:
This pull requests adds a Partition lesson to the Go SDK katas.  I would like to request the following reviewers:
(R: @lostluck )
(R: @henryken )
If accepted by both reviewers, please wait until the Stepik course is updated before finally merging this PR.

Thank you for your contribution! Follow this checklist to help us incorporate your contribution quickly and easily:

 Choose reviewer(s) and mention them in a comment (R: @username).
 Format the pull request title like [BEAM-XXX] Fixes bug in ApproximateQuantiles, where you replace BEAM-XXX with the appropriate JIRA issue, if applicable. This will automatically link the pull request to the issue.
 Update CHANGES.md with noteworthy changes.
 If this contribution is large, please file an Apache Individual Contributor License Agreement.

See the Contributor Guide for more tips on how to make review process smoother.

commit.message: Add Partition task to Core Transform katas

nodes.bodyText:
I realize that we're using multiple versions of Beam, from v2.19 to v2.22.
Can we standardize to just one version for the entire course?

nodes.bodyText:
Just would like to check whether you intend to have an answer placeholder for the return value?
In other tasks, we normally don't ask that.
